## About the Blog 
This blog created for the Monash University subject ETC5523: Communicating with Data to discuss the current state of the coronavirus. Link for the Monash Business Analytics course can be found [here](https://numbat.space/) 

## About Me 

I am Vinny Vu, currently a student at Monash University completing my Masters of Business Analytics expected to graduate in 2021. For further information follow the [link](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vinny-vu-809bb1139/) for my Linkdin profile.
